meanings.definition: The quality or state of being servile.
meanings.sent1: Her servileness was evident in the way she always obeyed without question.
meanings.sent2: The servileness of the butler was appreciated by the demanding guests.
meanings.sent3: The servileness of the puppy towards its owner was both adorable and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His servileness to authority was like a shadow, always following without question.
meanings.sent5: The servileness of the robot to its programming was both impressive and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a servant; servility.
meanings.sent1: In his servileness, he always put the needs of others before his own.
meanings.sent2: The servileness of the maid pleased her employer.
meanings.sent3: The servileness of the cat towards its owner was comical and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her servileness in the workplace was like a cloak, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The servileness of the student towards the teacher was both respectful and excessive.
